name: Move
rules: Move 1 tile.

name: Dash
rules: Move 2 tiles.

name: Attack
rules: Deal damage equal to your attack stat.

name: Ranged Attack
rules: Deal damage equal to your attack stat -1 to target within 2 tiles.

name: Repair
rules: Heal 2 HP.

name: Defend
rules: Gain +2 Defense until end of turn.

name: Energy Surge
rules: Gain 2 Energy.

name: Precision Shot
rules: Deal 3 damage to target within 3 tiles. Cannot miss.

name: Rally
rules: All allies gain +1 Attack this turn.

name: Desperate Strike
rules: Deal 2 damage. If you have 5 or less HP, deal +2 damage.

name: Power Strike
rules: Deal 4 damage to target.

name: Energy Blast
rules: Deal 2 damage to all enemies within 2 tiles.

name: Combat Protocol
rules: Deal 3 damage to target. Draw 1 card if it dies.

name: Defensive Matrix
rules: Gain 3 temporary HP and +1 Defense until end of turn.

name: Overcharge
rules: Deal 5 damage to target. Take 2 damage.

name: Barricade
rules: Blocks movement. +2 Defense to adjacent units. Cost: 4 bricks.

name: Bridge
rules: Connects two tiles. Units can move across. Cost: 6 bricks.

name: Turret
rules: Ranged attack: 2 damage, 3 range. Cost: 6 bricks.

name: Watchtower
rules: +2 Range to all attacks from this tile. Cost: 6 bricks.

name: Energy Core
rules: All adjacent units gain +1 Energy per turn. Cost: 8 bricks.

name: Healing Station
rules: Heal 2 HP to all adjacent units at end of turn. Cost: 6 bricks.

name: Auto-Repair
rules: Duration: 3 turns. Heal 1 HP at start of each turn.

name: Seek and Destroy
rules: Duration: 2 turns. +1 Attack against damaged enemies.

name: Stealth Mode
rules: Duration: 3 turns. Enemies cannot target you with ranged attacks.

name: Combat Protocols
rules: Duration: 2 turns. +2 Attack and +1 Defense.

name: Energy Efficiency
rules: Duration: 3 turns. All cards cost -1 Energy (minimum 1).

name: Overdrive Protocol
rules: Duration: 2 turns. +3 Movement and +2 Attack. Take 1 damage at end of each turn.

name: Energy Core
rules: Permanent: +1 max Energy.

name: Shield Generator
rules: Permanent: +2 Defense.

name: Speed Boost
rules: Permanent: +1 Movement.

name: Weapon Upgrade
rules: Permanent: +1 Attack.

name: Sensor Array
rules: Permanent: +2 Range.

name: Parry Matrix
rules: When you would take damage, prevent 2. Gain 1 Energy if attacker is adjacent.

name: Counter Strike
rules: When an enemy attacks you, deal 2 damage back to them.

name: Emergency Repair
rules: When you take damage, heal 2 HP.
